vista.graph
Class Curve

java.lang.Object
  vista.graph.GraphicElement
      vista.graph.Curve
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Animate, Bounded, Drawable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultCurve, FlaggedCurve, FlaggedCurve2D, ReferenceCurve
public abstract class Curve
extends GraphicElement

A superclass of all curves. A curve is a representation of a collection of (x,y) points. The first co-ordinate is plotted along the x axis and the second along the y axis. A curve data model contains all the information for displaying this view.

To each curve is attached an x and a y axis.

Version:
$Id: Curve.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:48:51 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu
See Also:
CurveDataModel
